name: Cavaliere
description: It is not enough to rudely and plainly strike your foe down. One must make it entertaining.

effects.result:
Dash 3, then dash 1 space to the side of your movement. This movement ignores all movement penalties and has *phasing*. However:
* You must move if able
* You must move as far as possible
* You cannot move diagonally during this movement
Foe is *dazed*.
Summon a **bomb**.

talents.name: i
talents.description: If you pass through an ally or summon during this movement, deal bonus damage.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: Allies you pass through during this movement can dash 1.

effects.result: Summon two **bombs** in range 2. You may dash 1 after summoning each bomb.
If you end your turn without attacking, you can then immediately gamble to detonate all bombs.

talents.name: i
talents.description: Fly 1 after summoning each bomb instead. *Charge*: Fly 2 instead.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: You can allow any ally in range 2 to dash 1 before summoning a bomb instead.

mastery.name: Il Caos, La Mia Musa
mastery.description: When you summon a bomb with this ability, you may bounce it it off a character in range, dealing 2 damage, then summon it in range 2 of that character.

name: Spinning Top
description: A blur of cape, a flash of color, the gleaming of blades.

effects.result:
*Gamble*, then dash that many spaces +2 in a whirling dance.
* You must move as far as possible before an obstruction causes you to stop
* You must make all movement in the same direction.
* You cannot move diagonally using this movement
* However, you can interrupt spinning top with any number of other abilities without causing the movement to end.
If you move the maximum distance rolled by Spinning Top, gain *evasion* until the start of your next turn.

talents.name: i
talents.description: You can always choose to dash 3 spaces with spinning top after seeing your gamble result.

mastery.name: Vortice di Follia
mastery.description: If you triggered a *slay* effect during your turn before using spinning top, it becomes a *free action*.

name: Death
description: A shard of Divine Death, summoned with a snap of the finger.

effects.result: *Gamble*, then count the spaces out from you along the line. The space rolled is the attack space.
fray
Character explodes in a large blast *area effect* centered on them, dealing fray damage.
Death deals 999 divine damage instead to your attack target if they are at 8 hp or less.

talents.name: i
talents.description: If there’s a *bloodied* character in the area, roll 1 more d6 and choose any result.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: *Slay*: create a *pit* under your target, and summon a **bomb** in the pit.

mastery.name: Ultima Death
mastery.description: Increase death’s threshold to 16 hp or less.

name: Gallows Humor
description: The power of Divine Death flows through you, empowering your strikes.

effects.result:
Set out a d6 power die, starting at 1. While in this stance:
* When this stance refreshes, or when you or an ally anywhere misses or is missed by an attack, tick the die up by 1.
* When the die is at maximum, you may reset it to 1 when you or an ally uses an ability to empower it. The ability deals bonus damage and triggers any slay effects, hit or miss.
This stance refreshes at the start of your turn.

talents.name: i
talents.description: Gallows humor instantly ticks up to maximum if an ally is defeated anywhere.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: The empowered ability gains *effect*: deal 4 damage again to any target at 25% hp or lower.

mastery.name: Maestra Mortale
mastery.description: While in this stance, all your abilities with an action cost of 1 or 2 gain *slay*: all allies may dash 1, then foes adjacent to at least one ally that dashed this way take 2 damage.

name: Party Favor
description: The Fool’s arsenal is deep, their mirth infinite, and their ability to turn nearly anything into an explosive is legendary.

effects.result:
You throw an explosive mine into a free space in range 3. When any character enters the space, the mine explodes with a medium blast area effect centered on it. When activated, *gamble* to see the effects, which stack. Then, the mine is destroyed, ending the terrain effect.
* 1-3: Yourself and allies in the area fly 1. Foes take 2 damage.
* 4-5: Foes are additionally blinded.
* 6: Yourself and allies also gain stealth.
Foes take 2 damage, twice.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: *Dazed* or *Blinded* foes activate the *Finishing Blow* effect.

mastery.name: Amico
mastery.description: You can throw the party favor at any character in range instead, making it a *mark*. You can *gamble* at the end of any turn after yours to detonate it, ending the mark and effect.

name: Masquerade
description: The Fool knows how to move unseen, slipping through shifting faces and voices like a fish through water.

effects.result: An character uses an ability against you, and there’s a willing ally in range 3.
Swap places with your ally, teleporting both of you, and the ability targets your ally instead. If you or your ally can’t make a valid teleport, this interrupt can’t be made.

talents.name: i
talents.description: If you haven't acted yet this round, gain *evasion* after swapping until the end of your next turn.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: Fly 1, then summon a **bomb** after swapping.

name: Diablo
description: A snap of the finger summons the fool’s cross, the mark of the Laughing God, writ in hellish flames.

effects.result: The attack space of this ability is your choice of one of the four edge spaces of the blast.
Attack target is *blinded*.
Deal 2 damage, once, to all foes in the area for every foe or ally in end spaces of the cross, including the attack space.
Cross counts as having +1 foe in an end space.

talents.name: i
talents.description: If you catch 2 or more foes or allies in the end spaces of the cross, summon a **bomb** in the center space if it is free.

talents.name: ii
talents.description: Allies in the area can fly 1. *Charge*: Allies in the area can fly 3.

mastery.name: Hell Festival
mastery.description: You can also choose to *end your turn*, mark out the area effect and gain *delay*: You must take a *slow turn* next round. At the start of that turn, the area explodes again, dealing [D] damage to all characters within as an *area effect*, and summoning a **bomb** adjacent to each foe in the area.

effects.result: Mark self or an ally in range 2. While marked, that character can use the following interrupt:
The start or end of any turn other than yours.

*Gamble*, then the marked character dashes a number of spaces equal to the gamble result, 1 space at a time. Each time they finish a dash, they may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe, but cannot damage the same foe more than once in the same turn.

talents.name: i
talents.description: This dash gains *phasing* and ignores movement penalties from terrain.

mastery.name: Revolution
mastery.description: You can take this interrupt three times a round. The second time you use it, the dash becomes just 2 spaces, and the third time just 1 space.
